department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) would like to obtain cadastral, engineering, control and construction survey services of diverse nature, on an as required basis. The services will support a team of architectural, engineering and construction contractors in the redevelopment of various sites within the City of Ottawa, including but not limited to: Blocks 1, 2, 3 and 100 Sparks/30 Metcalfe Street. PWGSC intends to issue two (2) SOs for the required services to be provided as a result of this solicitation. This RFSO will be resulting in Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISOs) valid for three (3) years + 2 options years. PWGSC is the only client authorized to issue call-ups. PWGSC intends to put in place Standing Offers with the highest ranking Offerors based on an ideal business distribution percentage.
tags: Survey, Engineering, Construction, Architecture, Government, Public Works, Canada
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
Cadastral and Engineering Survey Services for Public Works and Government Services Canada

## Solicitation Summary

The Government of Canada is seeking bids for Campus Redevelopment Survey Services under Contract PW-__FK-322-81580. This solicitation invites contractors to provide Services for cadastral, engineering, control, and construction survey services. 

## Background

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) intends to establish two (2) Standing Offers (SO) with the highest ranking Offerors for the required services. The successful Offerors will provide Services to support a team of architectural, engineering, and construction contractors in the redevelopment of various sites within the City of Ottawa.

## Services to be Provided

Contractors will be required to provide a range of Services including:

- Cadastral surveys
- Engineering surveys
- Control and construction surveys
- Support for architectural, engineering, and construction contractors in site redevelopment

## Feasibility and Eligibility of Commercial Enterprise and its Bidder Personnel

All interested Suppliers may submit bids. Contractors must:

- Possess a valid Facility Security Clearance at the SECRET level
- Hold a valid personnel security screening at the SECRET level
- Have a current Participant status in the Definitive Pre-Qualification List (DPQL)

## Pricing

Pricing information is requested for all of the above Services.

## Security Requirements

Contractors must have a valid Facility Security Clearance at the SECRET level and hold a valid personnel security screening at the SECRET level.

## Tender Information

Tender documents can be found here: 
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/28/db35cffa326dfa07d92dc9feade5ebf2/addendum_1_explanatory_plans.pdf

The online submission deadline is April 11th, 2023 at 14:00. 

Note:
It is mandatory that you address any security requirements in your bid. Failure to address security requirements may result in the rejection of your bid. The specific Deliverables reported in Part 5 of the contract, are treasures to the decision making committee for source selection. Incomplete or inconsistent responses may result in the warding of points.
